aspguidp.service.core.asp

Interface AnswerSetManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DlvAnswerSetManager

    public interface AnswerSetManager
    Interface for an answer set manager.

    An answer set manager is responsible for extracting the answer sets from the output of a logic program solver.

    An instance of a answer set manager is passed to an AspSolverService instance, when the logic program of the solver service is executed. The answer set manager instance provides a observable property which is set to the resulting answer sets of the logic program after execution. Additionally, the instance provides a observable property which signals, if the execution of the logic program did not lead to any answer sets.

    Usually, only one answer set manager instance is used in the application.

      • setPropertiesBySolverOutput

        void setPropertiesBySolverOutput(java.lang.String solverOutput)
        Extract the answer sets from the given solver output and set it to the observable property of the answer set manager instance. This method is called by the answer set programming solver service with the output of the solver after the execution of the logic program.
        Parameters:
        solverOutput - output of the executed logic program solver
